name: mister-mind
description: AI-Powered QA Framework with Multimodal Commander - Type-Safe Sovereign Edition with Strict TypeScript, Hardware Telemetry, Swarm Orchestration & Bulgarian Voice Feedback
author: Димитър Продромов (Dimitar Prodromov) <dimitar.prodromov@mistermind.dev>

scripts.dashboard: npx ts-node -e "const { DashboardServer } = require('./src/enterprise/dashboard-server'); const d = new DashboardServer(); d.start().then(() => console.log('Dashboard: http://localhost:3847'));"
scripts.license:generate: npx ts-node -e "const { LicenseManager } = require('./src/enterprise/license-manager'); const m = new LicenseManager(); console.log(m.displayStatus()); const l = m.generateDevLicense('Dev', 'dev@test.com'); m.saveLicense(l); console.log('License saved!');"
scripts.license:status: npx ts-node -e "const { LicenseManager } = require('./src/enterprise/license-manager'); const m = new LicenseManager(); m.loadLicense(); console.log(m.displayStatus());"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
